image.raw_results: Optimal posting times for Facebook are between 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM on weekdays and 12:00 PM - 2:00 PM on weekends. It's important to consider the audience's timezone when scheduling posts. Additionally, platform-specific tips include using engaging visuals and incorporating relevant hashtags to increase visibility and engagement.
